plays.text: Penalty to Brandon Bochenski 2 minutes for Hooking Jonathan Cheechoo
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Mike Fisher
Penalty to Mark Smith 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Dominik Hasek
Penalty to Kyle McLaren 2 minutes for Holding Patrick Eaves
Penalty to Josh Gorges 2 minutes for Interference Patrick Eaves
Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 2 minutes for Hooking Milan Michalek
Goal scored by Patrick Marleau unassisted
Penalty to Vaclav Varada 2 minutes for Hooking Joe Thornton
Penalty to Peter Schaefer 2 minutes for High Sticking Christian Ehrhoff
Penalty to Josh Gorges 2 minutes for High Sticking Peter Schaefer
Goal scored by Nils Ekman assisted by Joe Thornton AND Jonathan Cheechoo
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Grant Stevenson
Penalty to Doug Murray 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Bryan Smolinski 2 minutes for Tripping Kyle McLaren
